  Five Fun Facts about Alyssa Columbus
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
```

1. I enjoy spending time outdoors, especially by the ocean.

2. I also enjoy birdwatching. My favorite birds are [Cedar Waxwings](https://www.allaboutbirds.org/guide/Cedar_Waxwing/overview).

3. One of my hobbies is competing in online cybersecurity (i.e., Capture the Flag) competitions.

4. I enjoy volunteering, especially for the [Girl Scouts](https://www.girlscouts.org/).

5. I am the founder of [the Irvine, CA chapter of R-Ladies Global](https://www.rladiesirvine.org).
